Help.Help: Show this help message and exit.

Start.Ip: The IP address to bind to (defaults to %d).
Start.Port: The port to bind to (defaults to %d).
Start.DBHost: The host address for the database (defaults to %d).
Start.DBPort: The port for the database (defaults to %d).
Start.SSHPfx: Path to a valid SSH .pfx file (defaults to %d).
